title: Update footer website link to open www.vinodelectricals.com

requirements.summary: Add a visible footer website link that displays "www.vinodelectricals.com" and opens exactly https://www.vinodelectricals.com without impacting the existing Admin link.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer contains a visible website link whose displayed text is exactly "www.vinodelectricals.com".
Clicking the footer website link navigates to (or opens) exactly https://www.vinodelectricals.com.
No other footer links (e.g., the Admin link) are changed or broken.

file_operations.description: Add/update a dedicated website <a> in the footer with href set to exactly "https://www.vinodelectricals.com" and link text set to exactly "www.vinodelectricals.com". Place it alongside the existing footer links while keeping the current Admin hash link unchanged and functional.
